text: 9|117|tirccayayum pravacakanreyum, nerukkattinre ghattattil addehatte pintutarnnavaraya muhajirukaluteyum ansarukaluteyum nere allahu kaninn matanniyirikkunnu-avaril ninn oru vibhagattinre hrdayannal terrippeakumarayatinu sesam. ennitt allahu avarute nere kaninnu matanni. tirccayayum avan avareat ere krpayullavanum karunanidhiyumakunnu
